extendedIngredients.name: whole kernel corn
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 can (15-1/4 ounces) whole kernel corn, drained

recipes.title: Cajun Vegetables
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Cook the vegetable blend and green beans according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, saute mushrooms in butter and oil for 1 minute or until crisp-tender. Add corn; saute for 1 minute longer or until heated through. Drain vegetable blend and beans; add to skillet. Stir in Cajun seasoning.                                        Yield: 6 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Cajun Vegetables in  Quick CookingSeptember/October 2005, p25                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (1 cup) equals 159 calories, 7 g fat (3 g saturated fat), 10 mg cholesterol, 512 mg sodium, 20 g carbohydrate, 4 g fiber, 4 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: Cook the vegetable blend and green beans according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, saute mushrooms in butter and oil for 1 minute or until crisp-tender.
Add corn; saute for 1 minute longer or until heated through.
Drain vegetable blend and beans; add to skillet. Stir in Cajun seasoning.
